title: Accessibility Audit Workflow
description: An interactive flowchart for conducting systematic accessibility audits on MicroSims, evaluating keyboard navigation, screen reader compatibility, color contrast, motion, and touch accessibility dimensions.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Education
Accessibility
WCAG
Instructional Design
Quality Assurance
subjectArea: Education, Instructional Design, Web Accessibility, Inclusive Design
learningObjectives: Identify the five key dimensions of MicroSim accessibility testing
Evaluate MicroSims against WCAG accessibility criteria
Conduct systematic accessibility audits using a structured workflow
Prioritize accessibility fixes based on impact and severity
prerequisites: Basic understanding of web accessibility concepts
Knowledge of WCAG guidelines helpful but not required

controls.description: Click left side of test node to mark as Fail
Click right side of test node to mark as Pass
Click any node to view details and test questions
Reset All button clears all test results

assumptions: Visual pass/fail tracking helps identify gaps
Specific test questions guide thorough evaluation
limitations: Audit checklist covers common issues but may not catch all edge cases
Does not perform automated accessibility testing
Requires manual testing of each criterion
